body:
Was synching my full node for 4 days now, got to block 350K until we had a power outage. Right now, I can't start bitcoind, getting a permission error and also getting a permission error in the debug.log file.

When I try to run bitcoind -daemon..
Error: Cannot write to data directory '/home/pi/.bitcoin'; check permissions.

Tail of debug.log file..

2018-07-04T23:27:33Z *** System error while flushing: Fatal LevelDB error: IO error: /home/pi/.bitcoin/blocks/index/000324.log: Read-only file system
2018-07-04T23:27:33Z Error: Error: A fatal internal error occurred, see debug.log for details
2018-07-04T23:27:33Z FlushStateToDisk: failed to flush state (System error while flushing: Fatal LevelDB error: IO error: /home/pi/.bitcoin/blocks/index/000324.log: Read-only file system (code 0))

Any help or advice would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks,
Armin
title: Sync Interrupted, Can't continue synching full node.
